t: Anyone have recent experience with Amazon Accelerator programme?
s: They say they will take over the marketing and give you the best placements in exchange for being exclusive to Amazon but in the T&Cs they state they reserve the right to acquire the brand for a very small sum of money if they choose to acquire it which makes us very nervous indeed !
